attributes.action: reconsider the proposal to charge extra tax on "peace and quiet"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People in rural areas, with good views, etc are already paying extra costs in the valuation of their home and for transport etc.  How can the Government justify charging even more?
A valuation of a home is only "paper money".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
